alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 24 at 5:22PM MST until November 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow this evening, tapering off slowly after Midnight MST. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Areas above 7500 feet near Buffalo Pass, Sawmill and high spots west of Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 5 AM Saturday: Buffalo Pass 4 to 8 inches Ganado 0 to 1 inches Window Rock 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
